info.name: Replace 🌟 icon for Messenger
info.description:
I made this just for fun. This will change the 🌟 icon into the new one I have found.
This is just available for Messenger website. ( You can use this base code to customize your own or change with image customize)
*Better in Dark theme*
*Mario Addon:
🌹 replace with power flower.
🕊 replace with feather.
🤗 replace with mario.
💰 replace with coin.
🐻 replace with Goomba.
🍄 replace with Mushroom.
🐢 replace with Troopa.
info.additionalInfo:
*🌟 Replacement(Ver 1.1)
*I think I will make an addon about mario
By SPdream

options.label: Mario
